assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: KDC, ESZ, and MRH were supported by a research grant from Sanford Health. CH is an employee of Helix OpCo, LLC. RCG has received compensation for advising Allelica, Atria, Fabric, Genome Web, Genomic Life, and VinBigData and is co-founder of Genome Medical and Nurture Genomics. The remaining authors have nothing to disclose.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The research protocol was approved by the Sanford Health and Harvard Pilgrim Health Care Institute Institutional Review Boards. Individual-level patient data were deidentified before being provided to the study team, and informed consent was not required.

funder.name: Foundation for the National Institutes of Health
Imagenetics Initiative and Sanford Chip Program from Sanford Health
